body:
Does this happen reproducible?

If yes: Does this happen with wallet disabled? Does this happen in `valgrind ./src/bitcoind...` as well?

> Does this happen reproducible?
> 
> If yes: Does this happen with wallet disabled? Does this happen in `valgrind ./src/bitcoind...` as well?
